channel.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [GRA, RBX, SBG, BHS / France, Canada][ Cisco ASA firewall] – Baremetal – Cisco ASA firewall – Planned Service End of Life
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 31, 10:00 - 11:00 UTC

Dec 6, 12:21 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC
Service impact : As part of the product lifecycle management we plan to end the baremetal service of Cisco ASA firewall by August 31, 2022. This service interruption will concern only the customers who have previously subscribed to this service.
OVHcloud will decommission the service so that you won’t be able to connect to your Cisco ASA firewall from that date.
Please make the appropriate backup of your data prior that date.
---------------------------------------------------
Heure de début : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC
Impact du service : Dans le cadre de la gestion du cycle de vie des produits, nous prévoyons de mettre fin au service baremetal du pare-feu Cisco ASA au 31 aout 2022. Cette interruption de service ne concernera que les clients qui ont précédemment souscrit à ce service.
OVHcloud mettra le service hors service de sorte que vous ne pourrez plus vous connecter à votre pare-feu Cisco ASA à partir de cette date.
Veuillez effectuer les sauvegardes appropriées de vos données avant cette date.

item.title: [LIM1][Global Infrastructure] CPU temperature
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 19, 19:30 - 21:30 UTC

Jun 23, 03:35 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 19/07/2022 19:30 UTC
End time : 19/07/2022 21:30 UTC
Service impact : There will be an expected 20 mins of downtime per server
Service improvement: The aim of this maintenance is to fix CPU temperature sensor bug.

item.title: [Global][Dedicated Servers] - resetHwFlag removal
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 18, 07:00 - 07:10 UTC

Jun 17, 12:12 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 18/07/2022 07:00 UTC
End time : 18/07/2022 07:10 UTC
Service impact : Customers using APIv6 with resetHwRaid within their scripts will get an error.
In order to solve the error, impacted customers should remove the flag from the script("POST /dedicated/server/{serviceName}/install/start" "resetHwFlag" in "details").
Service improvement : As part of our policy of continuous improvement, we will be making modifications to the baremetal software to remove the resetHwRaid optional flag, which could cause confusion as it is now performed systematically.

item.title: [WAW1][Dedicated Servers] - W17B02
item.description:
Jun 28, 20:24 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 28/06/2022 17:00 UTC
End Time : 28/06/2022 20:20 UTC
Service impact : Servers in this rack were unreachable
Root cause : An electrical issue caused the incident

Jun 28, 19:04 UTC
Update - Ongoing actions : 95% of the servers in the rack are reachable again.
Our teams are still working to solve the problem

Jun 28, 17:45 UTC
Update - Ongoing actions : 84% of the servers in the rack are reachable again.
Our teams are still working to solve the problem

Jun 28, 17:14 UTC
Identified - Start time : 28/06/2022 17:00 UTC
Service impact : Servers in this rack are unreachable
Root cause : An electrical issue caused the incident
Ongoing actions : Our teams are currently working to solve the problem

item.title: [CA][Dedicated Servers] - Servers rescue mode credentials
item.description:
Jun 28, 13:17 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 26/06/2022 00:00 UTC
End Time : 27/06/2022 07:19 UTC
Service impact : Rescue credentials for entering rescue mode were not sent when using password authentication method.

Jun 27, 07:27 UTC
Monitoring - Ongoing actions : Customers can use the password authentication method to access their servers in rescue mode.
Our teams are currently monitoring the situation.

Jun 26, 10:48 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 26/06/2022 00:00 UTC
Service impact : Rescue credentials for entering rescue mode are not sent when using password authentication method.
Customers can use ssh authentication method instead of password method as described here: https://docs.ovh.com/us/en/dedicated/creating-ssh-keys-dedicated/
Ongoing actions : Our teams are currently working to solve the problem

item.title: [GRA1][Dedicated server] G106A02
item.description:
Jun 28, 12:34 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 28/06/2022 07:21 UTC
End Time : 28/06/2022 09:30 UTC
Service impact : 4 Servers on rack G106A02 were unreachable.
Root cause : Due to a failure in the cooling system.

Jun 28, 08:14 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 28/06/2022 07:21 UTC
Service impact : 4 Servers on rack G106A02 are unreachable.
Ongoing action : Servers are being repaired in the workshop. we will provide updates as soon as possible.
Root cause:: Due to a failure in the cooling system.

item.title: [RBX3][Dedicated Servers] - 46C32
item.description:
Jun 26, 20:50 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 26/06/2022 19:48 UTC
End time : 26/06/2022 20:20 UTC
Service status : All servers in the rack 46C32 are operational.
The situation is back to normal, the service is running nominally, no data loss to report.
Root cause : The disjonction was caused by a water leak

Jun 26, 20:03 UTC
Identified - Start time : 26/06/2022 19:48 UTC
Service impact : Some servers in the rack 46C32 are unreachable
Root cause : Disjonction caused by a water leak
Ongoing actions : Currently, the service is being restored, the repair is done, some servers remain down and our teams are working on it.

item.title: [GRA1][Dedicated Servers] - G113A17
